description: Application for a non material amendment to Planning Application 18/12928/FUL (Demolition of 20-30 Beaufort Road and 25-41 Fassett Road and hotel buildings to rear. Refurbishment and conversion of 18 and 32 Beaufort Road and 23 and 43 Fassett Road, and erection of new buildings to provide a total of 20 houses and 69 flats, together with basement and surface car parking and landscaping (Revision to planning permission15/12107/FUL) dated 19/09/2019 incorporating the addition of rear staircase core on Block D, Fassett Road
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 6 (Cycle Storage) and 19 (Fire Escape) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide proposed roof plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.The submitted proposed roof plan is labelled as proposed second floor plan.
